<title level="1" right="Trait">[Sea Devil](/Traits.aspx?ID=235)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 347</row>

Evil ocean-dwelling humanoids, sea devils usually have darkvision and wavesense.
name: Sea Devil
